title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       Discover Indiana Dunes are short videocasts in which a park ranger shares interesting stories and information about Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore. Current videocast are listed below, and more are sure to come. Check back often for the latest installment of Discover Indiana Dunes.            Visit Your Indiana Dunes Videocast - Windows Media (320 X 240 px, 3,691 KB) Duration - 1 minute 56 seconds Join Ranger Jean-Pierre Anderson as he introduces the Discover Indiana Dunes video series. Transcript (pdf)               Inside the new Dorothy Buell Memorial Visitor Center Videocast - Windows Media (320 X 240 px 3,108 KB) Duration - 1 minute 38 second Take an inside tour of the Dorothy Buell Memorial Visitor Center that opened Fall 2006 with Park Ranger Kipton Walton. Transcript (pdf)          Winter Beach Videocast - Windows Media 320 X 240 px 8,930 KB MP4   13,858 KB Duration - 2 minutes 19 seconds  The winter beach is an exciting place to visit, hike along the beach and see shelf ice safely. Transcript (pdf)
